publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2002.1 John Scott: Common Agricultural Policy Health Checkâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-2002) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end "but, in so doing, notes the importance of consulting on the potential impact of progressive modulation on Scottish farms and affirms that any increases in European Union-wide modulation should be matched by a corresponding deduction in levels of voluntary modulation."
